item.description:
Let's revive last year's successful Training and Trivia event.

Come run with us for a 5-6 miler through Fresh Pond & Arlington, then stick around for Stump Trivia afterwards at Joe Sent Me. We'll meet for the run at 6:30 pm, then return to the bar around 7:15 - 7:30. Trivia starts promptly at 8:00. Trivia teams are limited to 6, so if we get enough people we can split into two teams.

Folks should feel free to come for just the run or just trivia if your social calendar prevents you from joining us for both! Hope to see you Tuesday!

Bill
item.how_to_find_us: Look for people in running gear just outside the bar

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Training and Trivia
